com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples

Interface IRWLockedTupleStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataStorage<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet>, com.ibm.arena.common.locking.IReaderWriterLock, IReadOnlyDataStorage<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet>, IReadOnlyTupleStorage, ITupleStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RWLockedTupleStorageProxy

    public interface IRWLockedTupleStorage
extends ITupleStorage, com.ibm.arena.common.locking.IReaderWriterLock
    Simply adds reader-writer lock semantics to the tuple storage. For write operations to tuple storage implementations must acquire the write lock and read operations, the read lock. The lock may be explicitly acquired for multiple reader or write operations and per the semantics of IReaderWriterLock, a read lock may be upgraded to a write lock, although both locks must be explicitly released.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples.ITupleStorage

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.IReadOnlyDataStorage

        readLock, readUnlock, writeLock, writeUnlock
